channel.title: Poirot on HD-DN
channel.description: Recent content in Poirot on HD-DN

item.title: The Murder on the Links
item.description: Poirot and Hastings, along with an arrogant Parisian detective, investigate the murder of a rich man under seemingly familiar circumstances. The solution lies in recalling this infamous crime and unravelling the man’s son’s love life.

item.title: The Mysterious Affair At Styles
item.description: While visiting the home of some friends, Mr. Hastings not only witnesses a murder by poisoning but also runs into his friend, the acclaimed Belgian detective Poirot.
